DsarPolicy.name: DsarPolicy
DsarPolicy.description: Represents a Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) policy created in the Privacy Center managed package. DSAR policies anonymize or transfer personal data from your org at your customerâ€™s request. This object is available in API version 50.0 and later.

Description.description: Description of the policy. The description is limited to 255 characters.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this policy can be used (true) or not (false) for data subject (customer) requests. The default value is false.
